column5: Looking for good motel for a two night stay in the Munsing area. A lot on the net but recommendations from your personal experience.
Top of the line would be the Holiday Inn. I actually was pleasantly surprised with Econo Lodge - Cherrywood, a few miles out of town.. Used Comfort Inn several times.

Dave, Unless you are dead set on staying a motel check out the following websites: http://www.tripadvisor.com/VRACSearc...+USA&outMonth= http://www.vrbo.com/vacation-rentals...nsula/munising Some of these places will rent to you even when you are staying for just 2 days. Depending on how many people you have staying with you, you can save some money by booking one of these places. You also have more privacy, you can also save money by have cooking some of your own food. Where are going after you leave Munising ? BOB
